MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 18-JAN-2021 15:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a fault with the power in the SY14 postcode area of Malpas affecting properties in Mill Grove, Mill Lane, Mill View Close and surrounding area. This is causing an intermittent supply to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 12:30pm. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 1:33pm on 18th January 2021
